Tahitian is the officially recognized language of the islands of French Polynesia and is spoken throughout Oceania .Tahitian is a language of Eastern Malayo - Polynesian origin that has much in common with the Rarotongan and Hawaiian languages .It is spoken principally in the Society Islands , an island group which includes the island of Tahiti .
